body.name: Elgato Stream Deck MK.2 – Studio Controller, 15 macro keys, trigger actions in apps and software like OBS, Twitch, ​YouTube and more, works with Mac and PC
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 31 mins
features: 15 Customizable LCD Keys: instantly control your apps, tools and platforms.
One-Touch Operation: trigger single or multiple actions, launch social posts, adjust audio, mute mic, turn on lights, and much more.
Visual Feedback: know that your command has been executed.
Powerful Plugins: Elgato 4KCU, OBS, Twitch, YouTube, Twitter, Discord, Spotify, Philips Hue, and many more.
Hotkey Actions: streamline your film editing, music production, photography workflow, etc.
body.description: Stream Deck gives you 15 fully customizable LCD keys to control your apps and tools. Trigger actions, launch social posts, adjust audio, play sound clips, activate lights, and much more. Hit the Stream Deck Store for app plugins, icon packs, thousands of royalty free tracks plus effects, and switch out faceplates to make Stream Deck yours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will improve your productivity!
reviews.reviewText: Using the Elgato Stream Deck MK.2 during my streaming sessions brings me an incredible sense of control and efficiency. Being able to trigger actions with a single press of a macro key is not only satisfying but also saves me precious time. It allows me to focus more on engaging with my audience and delivering high-quality content.The seamless integration with popular apps and software like OBS, Twitch, and YouTube enhances my streaming experience and enables me to create a polished and professional-looking stream. I can easily switch scenes, adjust audio levels, and execute various commands without interrupting the flow of my content.The versatility of the Stream Deck MK.2 is truly impressive. It adapts to my needs and preferences, allowing me to create custom profiles for different streaming situations. Whether I'm streaming games, hosting a live Q&A session, or showcasing my creative work, the Stream Deck MK.2 empowers me to execute tasks effortlessly and elevate the overall quality of my streams.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevating Efficiency and Streamlining Workflow with Intuitive Functionality
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought the Stream Deck to enhance efficiency in my workflow. Navigating through various tasks has become notably smoother, with dedicated pages for specific applications like Spotify and OBS, totaling over 8 pages (you can have more if you want). The device has undeniably streamlined my access to essential functions. Additional pros include its user-friendly interface, customizable options, and the potential for increased productivity across various applications. I love the plug-ins, there is so much variety and you can even use Stream Deck to turn on/off your lights in your room (I use Govee LED and it’s connected to a Amazon power source that is directed by Stream Deck to turn off from just the click of a button). Overall, this deserves more than 5 stars, even if you aren’t a gamer or streamer, you can use it for apps such as IntelliJ, and access your programming apps faster (I also use it for this).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Powerhouse of Customization
reviews.reviewText: Stream Deck is a powerhouse of a studio controller, and I've been thoroughly impressed with its capabilities. Right from the moment you hold it, the build quality exudes excellence, and the screens in each button offer outstanding clarity.What truly sets this product apart is the accompanying app. It's a game-changer, providing seemingly endless possibilities for customization. Whether you're programming a soundboard, managing smart switches for lights and speakers, or initiating apps, the Stream Deck handles it all with ease.While I find it relatively simple to use, it's undoubtedly a power user product. It might not be as useful for casual users due to the learning curve in setting it up and maximizing its potential. However, for those willing to invest the time, it's a tool that opens up a world of creativity and efficiency.Its build quality, clarity, and the versatility of the app make it a must-have for streamers, content creators, and anyone seeking a highly customizable control hub for their digital activities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic product for productivity
reviews.reviewText: Those guys deserve a review...The product is well priced, versatile, and easy to use.While the product caters mostly to gamers and streamers, I discovered that it could fulfill a need in the more boring productivity needs.I work with 3 screens and need to quickly be able to do things like stopping music, muting teams, accessing a work application (outlook, apple mail...)Specifically, the teams integration is easy. I have now button short cuts for Teams action which is great when I'm doing something else at the same time.The possibility are infinite. I think an average user can setup the prodcut pretty fast for basic actions.The software is solid and intuitive .Good job to the Elgato team. You created a blockbuster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is amazing
reviews.reviewText: i love tech and using and trying new things, however, I am often limited to what I can do since I use Mac, this however works with Mac and is so cool. I was going to get the 6 button one but they're on back order, so happy that they are because this one is so much more useful. If you are on the fence about getting it just do it its so worth it. Build quality is outstanding and the app that you use to set it up is super user friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The Elgato Stream Deck
reviews.reviewText: The Elgato Stream Deck is a compact powerhouse for content creators, offering customizable control with its sleek, durable design. Its intuitive software allows for easy assignment of actions and macros to the programmable buttons, streamlining tasks with a single touch. The dynamic LCD keys with customizable icons provide visual feedback, enhancing engagement without constant screen glancing. With seamless integration into popular platforms and support for plugins, the Elgato Stream Deck is a versatile tool that justifies its higher price tag for those serious about content creation and streaming. By the way, I only use it for gaming with my friends and capturing clips for games to enjoy memories, so it's worth $150. The day I ordered it was on 12/11/2023.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my Zoom presentations
reviews.reviewText: I use it with OBS and Zoom and it has proven to be invaluable. Easy to use. The supporting software could benefit from a more Mac-centric design but it’s functional. I’d recommend it for any person who wants to automate their workspace with a programmable keypad. I know there’s an iOS app that allows for 6-buttons, but having a dedicated physical device is most ideal.,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars better than the v1
reviews.reviewText: Great for streaming, editing, and casual PC use.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen producto ayuda a la productividad
reviews.reviewText: Si eres creador de contenido o sencillamente sueles ocupar varias programas para presentaciones, diseño y demas, es un gadget muy bueno, ya que te permite tener muchas funciones a la par que las puedes ordenar segun el programa o actividad, la verdad te ayuda a tener un flujo de trabajo mas rapido, ademas de que puedes personalizar muchas ademas al software que es muy intuitivo. 100% recomendado no te vas a arrepentir de comprarlo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for a racing sim rig
reviews.reviewText: I mounted this to my sim racing rig for use as a car control button box and it works great. I can easily load up profiles for all the different games I play (iRacing, ACC, F1) and get quick access to all sorts of functions that won't fit on the wheel itself. It is drop dead simple to use and a breeze to customize. Amazing little box.
Produto de alta qualidade e ajuda muito na produtividade... não só para livestreams, para o uso geral também. Recomendo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: At first I wasn't sure if I should purchase this but after using it and setting it up. I wish i would've bought it sooner. it is so nice to have multi action and with a simple press of the button it opens up everything you need.
Producto perfecto, versatil, da igual para lo que lo uses, es muy configurable, te facilita cualquier labor que quieras automatizar, controlozar luces inteligentes, edicion, etc etc....muy util.
